m_szDocTitle: Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock be Hurt Today by Falling Gas Prices? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock be Hurt Today by Falling Gas Prices? By Tony Owusu | 12/31/14 - 12:01 PM EST Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) shares are up 0.96% to $224.36 in trading on Wednesday after the electric vehicle manufacturer posted a detailed look at just how much range its different models get on a single charge. The company has faced questions about how far its vehicles can travel on a single charge since it went public. Those questions have been rekindled since Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced last Friday that the company's Roadster 3.0 upgrade
